means: [生]通过进化进程发展或发生

sentence.Network_en: We can evolve the truth from a mass of confused evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以从庞杂的证据中推断事实真相.

sentence.Network_en: If living creatures can indeed evolve, then human nature cannot remain unchanged.
sentence.Network_cn: ,如果生物真会进化, 人性就不能永久不变.

sentence.Network_en: We had to evolve the truth from a mass of confused evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不得不从大量庞杂的证据中推断出事情的真相.

《进化者（Evolver ）》是由Microniods制作，Bigfish发行的一款模拟类游戏。游戏中玩家可以控制一个进化机器，来帮助可爱的小动 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the general sense 'make more complex, develop'): from Latin evolvere, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out of' + volvere 'to roll'

entry.def: When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms.

example.ex: The bright plumage of many male birds has evolved to attract females...
example.tran: 很多雄鸟进化出鲜艳的羽毛是为了吸引雌鸟。

example.ex: Maize evolved from a wild grass in Mexico.
example.tran: 玉米是从墨西哥的一种野生禾本植物进化而来的。

entry.def: If something evolves or you evolve it, it gradually develops over a period of time into something different and usually more advanced.

example.ex: ...a tiny airline which eventually evolved into Pakistan International Airlines...
example.tran: 最终发展成巴基斯坦国际航空公司的一家小型航空公司

example.ex: Popular music evolved from folk songs...
example.tran: 流行音乐从民歌演变而来。

sentences.sentence: "We have developed a new theory of evolution"
"Modern man evolved a long time ago"
"I acquired a strong aversion to television"
"Children must develop a sense of right and wrong"
"Dave developed leadership qualities in his new position"

auth_sentence.content: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do any of you actually know how we evolve?

auth_sentence.content: Or did the baby-cry meow evolve in domestic cats?
auth_sentence.res_content: Or did the baby-cry meow evolve in domestic cats?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or did the baby-cry meow evolve in domestic cats?

auth_sentence.content: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 卷入,牵连;牵连到的事,复杂情况
stems_affixes.word_buile: involve[v.卷入,陷入,连累;包含,含有,涉及]+ment表名词→n.卷入,牵连;牵连到的事,复杂情况
revolve旋转+er表名词→子弹旋转打出
inter在……之间+volv转,卷+e→在[两者]间转→互卷
re再[重复]+volv转,卷+e→再转一次→旋转

stems_affixes.value_cn: 卷入,陷入,连累;包含,含有,涉及

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes a new technology doesn't drive the old one out, but only parts of it while forcing the rest to evolve.
Since then it has evolved into a global crisis.
LOL has evolved into something much subtler and sophisticated and is used even when nothing is remotely amusing.
More strains will evolve from the Ebola virus.

sentences.en: Language is constantly and gradually evolving.
sentences.cn: 语言在不断地缓慢发展。

sentences.en: He has evolved a new theory.
sentences.cn: 他已形成了一种新学说。

sentences.en: He evolved a system for making money quickly.
sentences.cn: 他想出了一套快速赚钱的方法。

jushi.english: Language is constantly and gradually evolving.
jushi.chinese: 语言在不断地缓慢发展。

jushi.english: The American constitution was planned; the British constitution evolved.
jushi.chinese: 美国的宪法是依计划制定的,英国的宪法是自然演进的。

jushi.english: How did Giotto evolve this very personal and original style?
jushi.chinese: 乔托是怎样形成自己的风格的?
